name: Shenandoah: Daughter of the Stars
overview: Originally scheduled for release in 1993 on the Amiga, this horizontally scrolling space shooter would eventually be reworked and released for PC and MUCH later as a Nintendo Switch game. Here you see it in its infant form. In it waves of aliens are randomly generated so that you cannot develop a pattern of play. You have 4 classes of weapons, with three power levels each to explore.
